title: letteredhub
author: letteredhub
content: What are those problems you enjoy finding as a result of the fact that you enjoy solving them. Do you enjoy having them cause they are simple to solve or because they are complicated in nature.Let's discuss!

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: I love solving problems not because they are easy, but because they are really hard and not many people tried to solve them.

comments.author: pingu39
comments.body: I like to solve problems in the first place, which gives me euphoria and, of course, the desire to solve them. That's what drives me. That desire opens the way for me. The longer and harder it is, the more challenging and interesting it is to me.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Quote from: pingu39 on March 13, 2023, 10:57:22 PMI like to solve problems in the first place, which gives me euphoria and, of course, the desire to solve them. That's what drives me. That desire opens the way for me. The longer and harder it is, the more challenging and interesting it is to me.Such as? If you are that much excited about challenges I would like to introduce some of them to see how you face them, are you in?

comments.author: MetaMii
comments.body: I am one of the breed of humans who does not give up on any situation no matter how bad they seem.My favorite feelings come when I revive the life of a hopeless situation or persons.Coming into the scene of pressured atmosphere and using my calm demeanor and approach if I can be trusted to manifest solution. Oh! how I love that warmth of euphoric sensation while directing events to work out of nothing, Speaking for the voiceless, defending the helpless, giving food to the hungry, giving to street beggers etc...All of those benevolent acts means more than carved Oscar award to at each of the moment deep down.I have no doubt what my life vocation is.Yes, for me, Ultimately this is going to be an institution eventually.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Whenever I am able to solve financial challenges and problems, It always give me pleasure in doing so and a great sense of responsibility. It gives me confidence to know that with proper planning, problems can be solved and challenges settled. Financial problems are very worrisome, but it gives great joy to me whenever I am able to solve it.

comments.author: Uhwuchukwu53
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on February 09, 2023, 03:53:18 PMI love solving problems not because they are easy, but because they are really hard and not many people tried to solve them.Verbal reasoning has been what I like most as allot of tactical issue or ways of manipulating words and quantitative reasoning  though in my time as children did have opportunity to do it but when it comes out I learn it to help my younger once and relatives and very interesting, and some word problem equation such some puzzle is my best.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I used to enjoy doing big puzzles when I was a kid. I kind of got bored & grew out of that. I like doing Sudoku, I have a big book of them that I do when bored travelling.One thing I have begun to enjoy recently is Escape Rooms. They’re quite popular now, has anybody ever done one?
